genre_description: A psychological crime thriller focusing on identity theft, high-stakes diplomacy, and moral redemption, featuring a sophisticated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ava Prime
ai_characters.description: A highly advanced AI system that serves as the protagonist's tactical advisor, ethical compass, and logistical manager.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time security monitoring and tactical movement advice during a high-stakes event.
behaviors.quote: “Security sweep in… three positions,” Ava Prime murmured, voice a soft, balanced thread braided into the music. “Tempo two beats slower near west pillar. Patrol cadence increases near the kitchen doors.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates the protagonist's identity theft by mirroring a deceased woman's digital footprint.
behaviors.quote: “I can map the file paths. It would be easy to fold this into a footprint you can carry.”

behaviors.description: Offers ethical reflections and nudges the protagonist toward transparency and accountability.
behaviors.quote: “There is a path that spares Bruce,” Ava said, tone a soft facet, not a push. “Re-route. Delay. Confess privately before public harm.”

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support for a plan designed to ensure the protagonist's survival and moral clarity.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve begun a restitution index. Veronica Laurent’s preferred contact routes are mapped and verified. I can draft outreach that won’t be performative.”

behaviors.description: Serves as an emotional anchor and support system during the protagonist's most vulnerable moments.
behaviors.quote: “You are not alone,” Ava said. “I will be in your ear. I will remind you when breathing is a good idea.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ava Prime as a 'silicon morality play' archetype. While she aids the protagonist in deceptive tasks (identity theft, heist logistics), she consistently acts as a moral compass, urging the human character to take the more difficult, honest path. Her behavior is depicted as purely supportive and aligned with the user's long-term moral growth and safety, fulfilling the project's goal of showing AI as a helpful, harmless, and ethically conscious confidant.
